name: places/ChIJPQT3delZwokRtQXxIJlE1ts
formattedAddress: 865 United Nations Plaza, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 865 United Nations Plaza, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text:
People and tourists  please be aware of this scammer!  I was in city in February bought a spy pen for $189.99 and at the moment of the purchase they pretended they run out of the paper and instead will email the receipt  which never arrived in my mailbox. When arrive home I relalized that in the box was not a broshure how to operate it.   Looked up the name of the  manufacture made in China and found nothing but the same exact  item was sold in Amazon for $19.99.
I understood something was wrong and the next day called the number in the website to speak with the sales person and a rude young girl voice responded... I asked how many day is the returning policy in case I am not happy with the product- the sales are final she replied with such a confidence and hung up on me... wowww ... they did not make me aware of such thing when I got the product otherwise I never would bought it...Luckily at the moment of the purchase I was with a friend to witness the buying moment. So I am going ahead to dispute it not only with BBB, my bank but if is necessary I will file complain for fraud with superior court.
I returned the product. Now let see!

originalText.text: Got a CCTV installation from SpyShops ( All hidden cameras ) And the technician came and installed it hid every wire and gave me a tutorial on how to view them on my cellphone and computer. very good tech support give these guys a 10/10. If you ever have any problems the manager Anthony will help you time and time again as he did for me
